评论详情: Extremely cheap material and not true to size. Waited more than 2 weeks for this lightweight jacket to be delivered. If it was as nice, warm, and pretty as it looks I'd recommend it but it's not.  Absolutely do not suggest this ugly, coarse, cheaply made "coat."
The zipper constantly falls off. It is cute though.
The jacket is light weight and reversible and it's warm. My great grand daughter loves it

评论概述: Super cute but sizing is off
评论详情: This is a super cute reversible coat! Both sides are cute! Be aware that is runs really large! We ordered a medium but truly an XS would have fit.

Physically, the jacket itself does not appear cheap, however, you can definitely feel the cheapness on the non softer side. But that’s not an issue for me, It kept me fairly warm on a windy spring day in CA. To me, it looks really cute, I haven’t washed it yet so Im unsure of how it’ll hold up, but I’ll update if it falls apart after one wash. The sleeves can be adjusted (tightness) same for the bottom, so that’s real neat. Pretty cute overall.

We love this jacket my granddaughter loves it so much. She has gotten so many compliments. It looks great on her. It’s loosen enough and comfy looking keeps her warm, especially with all the rain we’ve had recently it’s been a great jacket.!! And we love the hearts and the reversible option!!
My son loves this jacket! I highly recommend it.
Material is VERY THIN. zipper literally broke on first day. This sweater is really just for show. Also there's a hole cut open on the packaging. Seriously find another sweater somewhere else.
Incredibly cute but is still nice and warm for the winter. Pleanty of room for layering though if needed.

I saw review of this jacket from another seller that made me nervous. It said it was bad quality and runs small. It’s the opposite. It is very good quality and runs oversized! I got a medium and I’m 5,6 130 pounds and it is big on. It is literally the most adorable jacket I’ve ever owned! I will post pictures in a couple days. My only criticism is that the packaging was not good. It was thin and it got a hole in it on its travels. I wish it was in stronger packaging. But the jacket was fine. It’s also very warm and comfortable. I wish I could have it in every color!
